twitch_info.title: Highlight: 2+ Hours of Trying to Catch a Spider

message.body: dg reference
gl
ok, bye nameless Keepo
alright cya ig?
what's dg?
death grips
this is death grips?
the stream title
that's not a death grips reference sorry
that was just me saying I'm going to stream whatever I want
its literally the name of a song
but I just forgot to change it
@nameless_iw everything is the name of some song
yep
anyways joke fail
fial
gl debut debug mode
thanks
I think it's just going to be a day where I check out all of the attacks
nothing serious
haha u died lorema2SMOREc
hi nojah
I know it's been a while
you missed the insanely high quality intro cutscene
but I guess you can check the vod if you care enough
WTF?  I thought they banned you!  I'm reporting this as hate speech!
crimes against humanity
welcome jr
hopefully this game does not make you sick like the other one
What game made me sick?
Destruction State
the last game I played
I don't recall that.
I think it was either the speed of the bullets or the screen tilting
jrchadCeritaJudgesYou I don't think that was me.
you said something like that
maybe dizzy instead?
or maybe it made your head hurt
maybe that was it
Maybe I made a seizure joke?
probably
oh, you've already made it to climax 3
this is the point where shit gets real
hi
well, if by making it you mean typing in a timestamp, sure
welcome danil
and yeah, this is hard
max says that debut from climax 3 is harder than ds
yeah I read that
I guess it's true
I mean, I definitely can't beat the game from here right now
but I could beat ds
it's not really a fair comparison because of the practice difference, but still
Now try doing a no death run.
he died to that like 200 times + not including practice + maker advantage
so yeah i also guess it's true
@JRChadwick I'm on it, jr. give me like 1000 hours and I'll have your no death run
@daniil3308 yeah, he is definitely able to beat ds faster than that
jrchadFairyBoy
at least, I think so
any victory of this game is a no death run, by the way
so the person who beat it did it deathless
So you can't beat it if you die?  You get a different ending?
@JRChadwick if you die you have to start over basically
you only get 1 life
this is the game over screen right here
the only thing I can do on this screen is reset
No check points?  But this looks different than other playthroughs you have done.
algo is playing in practice tool now
well, this is just a practice tool, so I can go to whatever attack I want, But in the normal game there are no checkpoints, yes
I will show the first attack
Ouch.
so yeah, just like 3 more minutes of that and you win
normal game is the hardest beaten thing in this genre
only 1 person managed to beat it
yeah, it's either this or last tis
not that many people have played it though
I'm sure that we'll see at least 2 debut clears this year
there is a lot of people who are able to beat it
really? ao maybe, but who else?
quart, sinkun, zero
choko
sure, maybe these people are capable, but do any of them want to? the only person on that list who even might be interested in sinkun
i asked quart
he said that he would grind it
oh ok
after he completes his avoidance challenge
should be kind of soon
yeah
but he told me he plays in really short sessions and gets tired easily
so I wonder how he would deal with a long grind
maybe it doesn't matter
jrchadDarkSoulsDeath jrchadDarkSoulsDeath jrchadDarkSoulsDeath
@JRChadwick very useful emot
I have 244 deaths on this file
and it's only been 25 minutes
@JRChadwick It works
@mickoh__ hi mickoh, thanks, It will be a long recovery phase
but I have hope
Gl
hi xoryla, glad to see you
I know it's late for you
but this is my debut stream, after all
glad to catch your stream
game crashed LUL
dragonxplayer's practice tool is a bit broken
wish you to perform your debut well
you press t to set the timestamp
but if you set t=6500 it just crashes
or 6600 apparently
that's how he does it?
do you know why it crashes though?
ah, I see
I will have to do some offline research to get non-crashing values for every attack then
max made a tier list of all the attacks
I wonder where he put that one
In his pants?
there's an attack is scatter faith that is kind of similar
the coin things curve back and forth
@JRChadwick would be difficult to put an attack in your patns
right now the most evil attack feels like final climax
which is coming up soon
but the hardest attack is apparently the one after that
we'll deal with this one later
@JRChadwick You sound like a quitter.
I've quit games before
but I don't think I'll quit this one
look at that beautiful spider
max is such an artist
it has the wrong number of legs too
@Algosith Then maybe you're a *hacks and spits* a Communications major!
LUL
the onion tells me that's a good major
its legs length is wrong as well
according to biology
@daniil3308 I didn't know that. how long are the legs supposed to be?
@Algosith It's great if you're bad at being a student and making decisions.
do you any communications majors personally?
@algosith i mean they have to be symmetric
but they are absolutely not
@daniil3308 oh , good point
yeah, sure hope that never happens in a real attempt
@mickoh__ yeah, gotta really grind that stuff
are you thinking L needle or some kind of consistency stuff?
oh yeah
there is a lot of precision required with the size of the bullets
you have a lot of small gaps to go through
and I'm not even a needle player
I will need to improve in that
it amazes me how hard debut is, both in reading and execution
even though hitboxes are quite small
I think the bullets are still larger than apples
for a barrage game that's quite big
but yeah, some of the stuff max expects you to read is crazy
like in final climax, you have to read the screenwrap while dodging the previous wave of bullets
debut bullets are like twice bigger than in usual barrage game
ex colonel attack is the hardest there so far
I do like how he balanced it though
for me it's an attack where I have a fighting chance
but once I get better it will become harder to squeeze more consistency out of it
things are getting harder and harder over time
it's kinda like ao balances his games
you mean, how they get harder and harder?
c'mon man
final climax is surely harder than climax 3
climax 3 is harder than climax 2
e.t.c
oh
yeah, ao sure does like to do that as well
17 raiders from Mastermaxify have joined!
hi max
back
hey gl
I'm just trying to finish the last attack
how hard is this relative to Destruction State?
max this the guy who made and beat this game
@LoremasterNojah it makes destruction state feel like dark souls
max hasn't play dark souls but I'm sure he'd say something similar if he had
debut is the dark souls of fangames
well... to you and me Dark Souls isn't as bad as many make it out to be
@LoremasterNojah exactly, I mean it makes destruction state feel like a medium difficulty game
i expected The Choke to be actually an very easy attack even for me
but nah it's really chokeable
@daniil3308 well, it's not that bad, I just suck
I made some cupcakes that are like the Dark Souls of cupcakes
oh really?
because I use a full cup of cocoa instead of the recommended 3/4 cup
that's how you do it
so they are dark
amp up that chocolate flavoer
So they are bitter, dark, and dry?
nah they aren't dry
I compensate with more water
Good man.
I understand the basic premise of chemistry
thank you, I think it's cute too
welcome
it was very fitting when I was playing  DS which has koishi on the clear screen
Cocoa powder is hyrdophobic so you should add a little more sugar to it holds on to some more mosture.  Like one tablespoon.
@sertarn youkouso
it's not easy to make it to the clear screen though LUL
finally jeez
nice
GG
gg it's over
debut clear
congrats on ending the journey
it was shorter than I thought
nice work
only one day
jrchadLinkGG jrchadLinkGG jrchadLinkGG jrchadLinkGG jrchadLinkGG jrchadLinkGG jrchadLinkGG jrchadLinkGG
seeing this irl was quite an experience
thought it was going to take years
yeah that's a lot easier than the months that DS took
i find debut outro cutsene quite... inspiring
only 566 deaths?
that was the idea daniil
how many total deaths was ds?
sub 1 hour
that was really easy
but funnily enough, that was also my conclusion to hard grinds
@LoremasterNojah ds was like 6000 deaths for attempts
we ended with "i wanna debut" how ironic
How long did it take you from start to finish in your last attempt?
I like the message on the clear screen a lot
yeah
well i know what the "grindset" type of mindset does to a person
@JRChadwick 39 hours of attempts
and i know theres other people out there like me
@mastermaxify what it does?
No, just the last round you just did.
Without dying.
@daniil3308 it takes over your life if you arent careful, and i wasnt very careful
yeah, gotta be grounded
but as max's grindset is ending mine is just beginning
@JRChadwick I meant, how long did your 566th attempt last?
as proud as i am of all the things that i had achieved in the last 12 or so years of striving for improvement, it has negatively affected my life in various ways
so i dont regret the things i did, but its certainly time to put an end to it and change the course of my life
it's to be expected when you pour that much time into something that the majority of society does not acknowledge as worthwhile, and it doesn't leave much time for import life stuff either
so as of my debut clear, i am officially retired
i didnt originally make it with that intent, but seeing what debut ended up being
best of luck
@zViitor welmcome viitor, thank you
it's going to be a long journey
but I am prepared

i decided that before i leave, ill leave this game, to the world, to the others like me who are looking for that challenge, that genuinely pushes you, not some luck fest, something genuinely to push you to your limit and prove your ability to overcome something that seems improbable
@Mastermaxify yeah, it was like "oops harder than last tis probably"
this game was exactly what I was looking for
coincidentally
it was what i was looking for
i just didnt realise i was literally making it for myself as i was doing it lol
what have you done to my saves
I'm not sure how I got back into that cutscene
I'm not going to focus too much on fangames tho, it means nothing to society and doesn't improve my life at all
max, do you know?
it's like such a niche genre
page up and down
if you are in the practice tool
ah
pretty sure
LUL
needle??
is it gms test room?
lol
it is
anyone know how to do this?
ah
game of the year
I don't know how to do this but I have a feeling that if you contract AIDS, it will help.
LMAO
this is really fucking hard
max what are you going to play next after that pokemon game?
Algo you know the game VVVVVV?
yep
idk daniil
it'd be interesting if someone made a hack of that which was fangame-hard
there are some small vvvvvv sections in some fangame, but no fullgame hacks as far as I know
but it would be cool
you can do a lot of crazy stuff with the gravity gimmick
when Taste and I finish our game, would you want to design a game?
we could make it happen and you could include whatever mechanics you wanted
that could be an interesting idea
whenever the game is finished, I can think about it
if you could make something from scratch, is there anything close to it you'd base it off?
well, that's kind of the problem, most game bore me
I'd have to think very hard to find an interesting game to base it on
well you can make whatever you want if you're making it from scratch
souls would be obvious, but of course, rip salt mountain
I'm talking just about what the player could do
well I'm a much better coder than I was then
I could make a graphically minimalist Souls game
yeah, you probably could
of course, I think that only fromsoft can really make a good souls game
I haven't really seen any 3d ones that I've liked
for 2d, I thought salt and sanctuary was ok
I disagree; someone under the supervision of a pro player could make one that was MUCH tighter
well, I don't know if it's so much the mechanics as the world design
watching all those challenge runners has convinced me that From doesn't know how to make a "good" From game
it's hard to make a world as compelling to explore as they do
oh I could
maybe you'd handle that part then
but I figured you'd want more of a straightforward bossfight-focused game
since you've disdained the lore side of things before
actually, the reason I play souls games is for the exploration. the boss fights are what I go through mostly to get top the exploration
what's your opinion of Elden Ring?

@LoremasterNojah couldn't say, haven't played it. But I hear it's fun to explore. But I bet it suffers from the open world problem of "there's so much to do but much of it's copy paste and most of it is not necessary to beat the game"
I'm going to try some other attack
this is too hard LUL
everythings too hard
I need to get myself back to normal
phew
now I just need to get rid of that debug display
I don't even know the key
what a disaster this was LUL
Maybe you should play Fortnight.
careful, that comment will get you instantly banned in some parts
